price: 32. Waxaa ka mid ah Calaamooyinka Alle doonyaha badda maaxa buuro oo kale ah.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
